game

Class VacuumGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.VacuumGame

  • public class VacuumGame
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents the basic functionality of the vacuum game. This class is responsible for performing the following operations: 1. At creation, it initializes the instance variables used to store the current state of the game. 2. When a move is specified, it checks if it is a legal move and makes the move if it is legal. 3. It reports information about the current state of the game when asked.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VacuumGame(java.lang.String layoutFileName)
      Creates a new VacuumGame that corresponds to the given input text file.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameOver()
      Returns true if the game is over, false otherwise.
      Grid<Sprite> getGrid()
      Returns the gaming grid of the vacuum game.
      int getNumColumns()
      Returns the number of columns that this game's grid has.
      int getNumRows()
      Returns the number of rows that this game's grid has.
      Sprite getSprite(int i, int j)
      Returns the sprite which is at location (i,j) on the game's grid.
      Vacuum getVacuumOne()
      Returns the first player of the game, i.e vacuum one.
      Vacuum getVacuumTwo()
      Returns the second player of the game, i.e vacuum two.
      int getWinner()
      Returns 1 is the first player won the game, 2 if the second player won the game, and 0 if the game ended in a tie.
      boolean move(char nextMove)
      Returns true if the move nextMove is a valid move and applies that move.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VacuumGame

        public VacuumGame(java.lang.String layoutFileName)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new VacuumGame that corresponds to the given input text file. Assumes that the input file has one or more lines of equal lengths, and that each character in it (other than newline) is a character that represents one of the sprites in this game.
        Parameters:
        layoutFileName - path to the input grid file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public Sprite getSprite(int i,
               int j)
        Returns the sprite which is at location (i,j) on the game's grid.
        Parameters:

        j - The column location of the sprite being returned.
        Returns:
        the sprite at location (i,j).

      • move

        public boolean move(char nextMove)
        Returns true if the move nextMove is a valid move and applies that move. Returns false is the move is invalid.
        Parameters:
        nextMove - The move inserted by the user.
        Returns:
        true is nextMove is valid, false otherwise.

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Returns true if the game is over, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the game is over.

      • getWinner

        public int getWinner()
        Returns 1 is the first player won the game, 2 if the second player won the game, and 0 if the game ended in a tie.
        Returns:
        1 if vacuum 1 wins, 2 is vacuum 2 wins, 0 otherwise.
